definitions.title: n.[f.]
definitions.body: joining, joint (cf. yas.iylo0 elbow)—pl. cstr. [[[י]]][[אַצִּילֵי יד]] Ez Eze 13:18 (on [[יד]] cf. Sm Co);—joint of hand, i.e. elbow Ez Eze 13:18; [[אַצִּילוֹת יׇדֶיךָ]] Je 38:12 arm-joints.—:[[אַצִּֽילָה]] Ez Eze 41:8 obscure; perh. ´[[א]] is here a technical architectural term to the joining (cf. Sm Ke).
